name: UnofficialNBANews
0:
”Alexa open league talk”
”Alexa, ask league talk to give me an update on the Rockets.”
”Give me news on the Sixers”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: league talk
des: Do you love NBA basketball? Then this is the skill for you! Keep up with your favorite NBA teams or the entire league. Ask for news on the sixers, oklahoma city, blazers, or the entire NBA. This Alexa skill is not endorsed, sponsored, nor owned by the National Basketball Association.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
